text: Thanx for the feedback. I also upvoted it. Hope it will come soon.

Hi all,
I'm using the Sandbox provided in enterprice license. It syncs all properties which is nice. But Contacts, Companies and their Activities (Engagements if you prefer) are not synced.
We have several custom API integrations that we want to test in a Sandbox/staging environment and not in production env.
Does anyone know, or have any tips on how to sync all of this? Preferrably with timestamps intact (one API integration is to delete old activities).
thank you for the detailed answer

Hello to all,

What solutions do you use to manage a synchronized reservation and payment system with HubSpot?

Thanks & have a nice day,
